employee I worked on documentations to include Creating a unified graphical diagram that maps how each device is physically connected within the site to each other up to the point of demarcation Encrypted documents with all network devices info Projects included Making all routers and firewalls PCI and HIPAA Compliant Upgrading Internet at various Clinics Creating both hardware and network failovers in case of emergencies Setting up new Cisco and Fortinet Routers for Internet and VoIP Network Engineer SNR Systems Honolulu HI July 2009 to March 2011 As an SNR Systems employee I worked on Proposal drafts Solution implementation Support of the installed solution Projects included UCERA University Clinical Education Research Associates Network Support o Conducting a physical site survey
